name: Moon Rider
description:
Immerse yourself in a road adventure, leaving problems behind and delving into the depths of the human soul. Confront the storm of emotions and overcome all psychological stages. In this journey, every question, every dialogue is a conflict between decisions and doubts, revealing the depths of your own essence. Are you ready to embark on this adventure, or will you once again escape from your problems?

Features:

  • Narrative immersion — Explore the depths of the human soul, meeting strangers and answering questions, revealing your essence in visual novels.
  • Psychological questions — Answer questions that can help you understand and delve into the depths of your feelings.
  • Unique atmosphere and visual style — Enjoy beautiful, melancholic landscapes accompanied by soothing music and the sound of a motorcycle.

Moon Rider is not just a game. It's a meeting with yourself, a dive into your own human soul. Do you think you are ready to confront your own "self"?
